org.eleusoft.jsonread

Class JsonBoolean

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eleusoft.jsonread.JsonValue
      • org.eleusoft.jsonread.JsonBoolean

  • public abstract class JsonBoolean
extends JsonValue
    A JSON Boolean value.

    The JsonBoolean class is used through the TRUE and FALSE singletons.

    Author:
    michele

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static JsonBoolean FALSE
      The false singleton
      static JsonBoolean TRUE
      The true singleton

      The type of this JsonValue specialization,
      abstract boolean isTrue()
      Tests whether the value associated to this JsonBoolean is true
      String toString()
      Returns either "true" or "false".
